A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow. I don't really know where to even begin with this one. Never in my life have I been so disappointed leaving the theatre. The story was garbage. The pacing was off. There were as many plot holes as plot points. Things were set up and then thrown out\, jokes were made and didn't land. It stank of a Disney committee. Only watch if you are a Star Wars completionist\, and even then wait for redbox. This movie is not worth your $10 for a ticket.
